title: Patch 6.13 is live

embed.description: Tier restrictions in Diamond and above now allows three divisions of separation between teammates instead of two. We made it a bit too hard for top-tier players to play with friends in ranked, so we're relaxing restrictions to allow three divisions of separation.

body:
Patch 6.13 is now live in OCE. If you discover any issues or bugs after patching please post them here and we'll investigate.

Have a great day & see you on the rift!

Cheers!
Mindstar

replies.body: What is the Ranked 5's OCE Schedule Please i've waited the whole of This season for this moment!!!
The schedule isn't out just yet, but keep an eye out for it :)

teleport change in effect? if so the summoner spell info on champ select still says 3.5 second channel instead of 4.5 seconds as to the 6.13 change.

edit; In game says 4.5seconds, in champ select it's 3.5second.
